alert.note: Alert for South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 4:22AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cass County through 500 AM CDT... At 422 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Staples Airport, or 29 miles west of Brainerd, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pillager, Leader, Gull Lake, Sylvan, East Gull Lake, Casino, and Esterdy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.
